description.value: By activating your arcane sensory organ and analyzing ancestral memories and arcane lore, you can communicate with all kinds of people, animals, and even plants. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Speak with Animals], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Speak with Plants], and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Translate] as 3rd-rank arcane innate spells. You can cast each spell once per day.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
